title: FBS_SAFEREQ (Enum)
text:
TYPE FBS_SAFEREQ :
Definition of SF_SafetyRequest function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment:
State after Activate is set to TRUE or after a rising
trigger at Reset.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_CONF_OPMODE
rows.Comment: Operation mode with Acknowledge of safe mode.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_CONF
rows.Comment: Waiting for confirmation from the drive (system interface).

rows.Name: OP_MODE
rows.Comment: Operation mode without Acknowledge of safe mode.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_OPMODE
rows.Comment:
Error was removed. However S_OpMode must be set to TRUE or
S_Acknowledge must become TRUE before the FB can be
continued.

rows.Name: SAFE_MODE
rows.Comment: Actuator is in a safe mode.

rows.Name: ERR_ACK_LOST
rows.Comment: Acknowledgment lost while in the Safe state.

rows.Name: ERR_MONTIME
rows.Comment:
S_OpMode request could not be completed within the
monitoring time.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Static Reset detected in state 8401 Init.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_2
rows.Comment: Static Reset detected in state C002 (Acknowledge Lost).

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_3
rows.Comment:
Static Reset detected in state C003 (MonitoringTime
Elapsed).
